input.sentences: i was so nervous before getting married | but i managed to hold on .
when i was saying my bows | i almost forgot them ; i was really exited .
we then went to sign everything to make it all legal .
i am so happy now with my lovely husband .
output.sentences: Despite being nervous they managed to show up to be married
The couple were so excited they forgot to tie the bows on the candles
After the ceremony they had to sign the license to make it legal
The bride was so lovely and her new husband was happy.
